data.text: @Commonsensedee @njdotcom Have any actual data to back up that "common sense"?

@njdotcom Completely inaccurate number, how many would have died of the flu, heart disease and cancer during the same two year period. VAST MAJORITY died with Covid not because of Covid. Healthily humans had nearly no risk of dying.
@njdotcom Still holding on to the fear porn.  An anecdote about a 17 year old but nothing about the average age of those who died with/from Covid being over 85.
